text:
Hi,

just a usability comment. 

1) in every spot where a 'Bug' link exists, 
you could add an 'Enhancement' link to ellicit
more feedback (perhaps undesireable, but if you want to 
ellicit feedback, 'Bug' is not suggestive).

2) if I'm looking at the Ant product page and click the 
bug link, I should come directly to 
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/enter_bug.cgi?product=Ant
as opposed to the product list page.
creator: pklein@lehman.com

text:
A technique I have used is to make a "feedback" link on each page.

An analyst can then create "unique" bug and enhancement requests
with priority and release date from the set of comments.
